        public ConnectionNotification(android.app.Activity activity,
                              int NotificationID)
        Issues a new connection notification or cancels an existing one.
        Parameters:
        activity - from which the notification is issued
        NotificationID - defines which icon and text is issued;
        See Also:
        CANCEL removes an existing notification
